com.attivio.util.query

Class QueryTraverser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attivio.util.query.QueryTraverser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocaleAware

    public abstract class QueryTraverser
extends Object
implements LocaleAware
    Abstract base class for a query traverser that maintains tree state during traversal.

    NOTE: This class is not thread safe.

      • rewriteAll

        public final void rewriteAll(QueryRequest request)
        Recursively rewrite all queries in request using this traverser.

        WARNING: do not use this method unless you are sure you want to modify absolutely all queries in request.

        This method rewrites all queries in: QueryRequest.getQuery(), QueryRequest.getBoostQueries(), QueryRequest.getFilters(), QueryRequest.getFields(), QueryRequest.getFacets().

      • rewriteFilters

        public final void rewriteFilters(QueryRequest request)
        Recursively rewrite all filter queries in request using this traverser.

        This method rewrites all queries in: QueryRequest.getFilters(), QueryRequest.getFacets().

      • rewrite

      • rewriteChildren

        protected Query rewriteChildren(Query query,
                                QueryHandler defaultHandler)
        Called to recursively rewrite children of query.

        Override this method to provide custom traversal of children.
